name: Aheno Jumper
description:
WARNING

Aheno Jumper contains imagery/audio that some people might find creepy. If you are sensitive to this sort of stuff, I would not recommend that you play this.

Help Aheno navigate through a dark world.

MAKE SURE TO READ THE README!!

Oh, I'm also not entirely sure if the Linux and MacOS versions of the game work. So let me know if they do. Thanks!
